TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileSystemAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class FileSystemAccessRule Inherits AccessRule

summary.span: 表示定义文件或目录的访问规则的访问控制项 (ACE) 的抽象。

span.span: Represents an abstraction of an access control entry (ACE) that defines an access rule for a file or directory.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的基础的访问控制项 (ACE) 的指定的用户帐户，要提供 （读取、 写入等） 的访问类型的抽象，以及是否允许或拒绝该权限。The class represents an abstraction of an underlying access control entry (ACE) that specifies a user account, the type of access to provide (read, write, and so on), and whether to allow or deny that right. 此类还可以指定如何将访问规则传播到子对象。This class can also specify how access rules are propagated to child objects. 使用类，以创建新的访问规则。Use the class to create a new access rule. 您可以保留规则使用或类。You can persist the rule using the or class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除访问控制项 (ACE)。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control entry (ACE) from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference identity, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.FileSystemRights fileSystemRights, valuetype System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType type) cil managed

param.name: identity
param.span: 封装对用户帐户的引用的 对象。

span.span: An object that encapsulates a reference to a user account.

param.name: fileSystemRights
param.span: 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: 值之一，该值指定是允许还是拒绝该操作。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.

summary.span: 使用以下内容初始化 类的新实例：对用户帐户的引用、指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型的值，以及指定是允许还是拒绝该操作的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using a reference to a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建您可以保留使用的访问控制规则或类。Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the or class. 访问控制规则定义的用户帐户权限，以确定哪些操作以允许或禁止运行 Microsoft Windows 的计算机上。Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows.

span.span: The name of a user account.

param.name: fileSystemRights
param.span: 值之一，该值指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule.

param.name: type
param.span: 值之一，该值指定是允许还是拒绝该操作。

span.span: One of the values that specifies whether to allow or deny the operation.

summary.span: 使用以下内容初始化 类的新实例：用户帐户的名称、指定与访问规则关联的操作的类型的值，以及描述是允许还是拒绝该操作的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the name of a user account, a value that specifies the type of operation associated with the access rule, and a value that describes whether to allow or deny the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建您可以保留使用的访问控制规则或类。Use this constructor to create an access control rule that you can persist using the or class. 访问控制规则定义的用户帐户权限，以确定哪些操作以允许或禁止运行 Microsoft Windows 的计算机上。Access control rules define user account rights that determine which actions are allowed or disallowed on computers running Microsoft Windows. `identity`参数必须标识当前的计算机或域上有效的帐户。The `identity` parameter must identify a valid account on the current computer or domain. 该字符串采用以下格式，其中`DOMAIN`是有效的域名或计算机名的名称和`account`域或计算机上的有效用户帐户的名称： `DOMAIN\account`。The string takes the following form, where `DOMAIN` is the name of a valid domain or computer name and `account` is the name of a valid user account on a domain or computer: `DOMAIN\account`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来添加，然后从文件删除访问控制项 (ACE)。The following code example uses the class to add and then remove an access control entry (ACE) from a file. 你必须提供有效的用户或组帐户以运行此示例。You must supply a valid user or group account to run this example. [!code-cpp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IO.File.GetAccessControl-SetAccessControl/VB/sample.vb#1)]
